body.p: An entity also shall apply the requirement in paragraph 6.9.1(c) if these three conditions are met:

li.p: the entity makes a change required by interest rate benchmark reform using an approach other than changing the basis for determining the contractual cash flows of the hedging instrument (as described in paragraph 5.4.6);
the original hedging instrument is not derecognised; and
the chosen approach is economically equivalent to changing the basis for determining the contractual cash flows of the original hedging instrument (as described in paragraphs 5.4.7 and 5.4.8).
